languages.text: "Побойтесь гнева Бессмертного, Ваша Светлость! Что станет с вашим протекторатом или самим Империумом, если каждый будет делать, что вздумается? Нет, Лекс Империалис, том 249, параграф 18/2, поправка от двенадцатого года прошедшего миллениума гласит ясно: "Деяние, обошедшее священный закон Империума в поисках личной выгоды, есть проявление человеческой слабости, что подлежит искоренению".

traits.locale_text: "Побойтесь гнева Бессмертного, Ваша Светлость! Что станет с вашим протекторатом или самим Империумом, если каждый будет делать, что вздумается? Нет, Лекс Ипериалис, том 249, параграф 18/2, поправка от двенадцатого года прошедшего миллениума гласит ясно: "Деяние, обошедшее священный закон Империума в поисках личной выгоды, есть проявление человеческой слабости, что подлежит искоренению".

languages.text: "Fear the wrath of the Immortal One, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What would become of your protectorate or even the Imperium itself if every person did what you are proposing? No, Lex Imperialis, Volume 249, Paragraph 18/2, amendment of the twelfth cycle of the previous millennium clearly states: 'Actions that circumvent the sacred law of the Imperium in pursuit of personal gain are a manifestation of human weakness, which is subject to eradication.'"
languages.original_text: "Побойтесь гнева Бессмертного, Ваша Светлость! Что станет с вашим протекторатом или самим Империумом, если каждый будет делать, что вздумается? Нет, Лекс Империалис, том 249, параграф 18/2, поправка от двенадцатого года прошедшего миллениума гласит ясно: "Деяние, обошедшее священный закон Империума в поисках личной выгоды, есть проявление человеческой слабости, что подлежит искоренению".

traits.locale_text: "Fear the wrath of the Immortal One, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What would become of your protectorate or even the Imperium itself if every person did what you are proposing? No, Lex Imperialis, Volume 249, Paragraph 18/2, amendment of the twelfth cycle of the previous millennium clearly states: "Actions that circumvent the sacred law of the Imperium in pursuit of personal gain are a manifestation of human weakness, which is subject to eradication."

"Fear the wrath of the Immortal One, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What would become of your protectorate or even the Imperium itself if every person did what you are proposing? No, Lex Imperialis, Volume 249, Paragraph 18/2, amendment of the twelfth cycle of the previous millennium clearly states: "Actions that circumvent the sacred law of the Imperium in pursuit of personal gain are a manifestation of human weakness, which is subject to eradication."

"Fear the wrath of the Immortal One, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What would become of your protectorate or even the Imperium itself if every person did what you are proposing? No, Lex Imperialis, Volume 249, Paragraph 18/2, amendment of the twelfth cycle of the previous millennium clearly states: "Actions that circumvent the sacred law of the Imperium in pursuit of personal gain are a manifestation of human weakness, which is subject to eradication."

"Fear the wrath of the Immortal One, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What would become of your protectorate or even the Imperium itself if every person did what you are proposing? No, Lex Imperialis, Volume 249, Paragraph 18/2, amendment of the twelfth cycle of the previous millennium clearly states: "Actions that circumvent the sacred law of the Imperium in pursuit of personal gain are a manifestation of human weakness, which is subject to eradication."

languages.text: “请不要激怒不朽神皇的愤怒，大人！如果每个人都按你说的话去做，你的王朝，甚至整个帝国，会变成什么样子？不行，《帝国法典》第249卷，第18/2段，上个千年第12个年的修正案明确规定：‘若是为了寻求个人利益而规避帝国神圣的法律，这便是人类弱点的表现，必须将其根除。’”
languages.original_text: "Fear the wrath of the Immortal One, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What would become of your protectorate or even the Imperium itself if every person did what you are proposing? No, Lex Imperialis, Volume 249, Paragraph 18/2, amendment of the twelfth year of the previous millennium clearly states: 'Actions that circumvent the sacred law of the Imperium in pursuit of personal gain are a manifestation of human weakness, which is subject to eradication.'"

traits.locale_text: “请不要激怒不朽神皇的愤怒，大人！如果每个人都按你说的话去做，你的王朝，甚至整个帝国，会变成什么样子？不行，《帝国法典》第249卷，第18/2段，上个千年第12个周期的修正案明确规定：‘若是为了寻求个人利益而规避帝国神圣的法律，这便是人类弱点的表现，必须将其根除。’”

languages.text: «¡Tema la ira del Inmortal, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¿Qué sería de su protectorado y del Imperium si todo el mundo hiciera lo que sugiere? No. La Lex Imperialis, en su tomo 249, párrafo 18/2, enmienda del año doce del milenio anterior, declara tajantemente que "las acciones tomadas para evitar la sagrada ley del Imperium en aras del lucro personal son una manifestación de la debilidad humana y deben ser erradicadas"».
languages.original_text: "Fear the wrath of the Immortal One, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What would become of your protectorate or even the Imperium itself if every person did what you are proposing? No, Lex Imperialis, Volume 249, Paragraph 18/2, amendment of the twelfth year of the previous millennium clearly states: 'Actions that circumvent the sacred law of the Imperium in pursuit of personal gain are a manifestation of human weakness, which is subject to eradication.'"

traits.locale_text: «¡Tema la ira del Inmortal, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¿Qué sería de su protectorado y del Imperium si todo el mundo hiciera lo que sugiere? No. La Lex Imperialis, en su tomo 249, párrafo 18/2, enmienda del ciclo doce del milenio anterior, declara tajantemente que "las acciones tomadas para evitar la sagrada ley del Imperium en aras del lucro personal son una manifestación de la debilidad humana y deben ser erradicadas"».

languages.text: 「イモータル・ワンの怒りを恐れましょう、陛下！もし誰もが陛下の仰るように手続きを無視すれば、陛下の保護領、あるいは帝国そのものにまで何が起きるでしょう？いえ、前千年紀第12年に修正されたレックス・インペリア号249巻18/2段落には明確に記載されています。”個人の利益のために神聖な帝国法の抜け穴を求める行為は人類の弱さの表れであり、根絶しなくてはならない”と」
languages.original_text: "Fear the wrath of the Immortal One, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What would become of your protectorate or even the Imperium itself if every person did what you are proposing? No, Lex Imperialis, Volume 249, Paragraph 18/2, amendment of the twelfth year of the previous millennium clearly states: 'Actions that circumvent the sacred law of the Imperium in pursuit of personal gain are a manifestation of human weakness, which is subject to eradication.'"

traits.locale_text: 「イモータル・ワンの怒りを恐れましょう、陛下！もし誰もが陛下の仰るように手続きを無視すれば、陛下の保護領、あるいは帝国そのものにまで何が起きるでしょう？いえ、前千年紀第12周期に修正されたレックス・インペリア号249巻18/2段落には明確に記載されています。”個人の利益のために神聖な帝国法の抜け穴を求める行為は人類の弱さの表れであり、根絶しなくてはならない”と」

languages.text: « Oh que oui. Sauf si vous voulez vous attirer les foudres de l'Immortel, bien sûr ! Que deviendraient votre protectorat et l'Imperium lui-même si tout le monde s'octroyait des libertés comme vous le suggérez ? Non, l'amendement au paragraphe 18/2 du volume 249 de la Lex Imperialis, adopté le douzième an du millénaire dernier, est formel sur ce point. Je cite : "Toute démarche dérogeant à la loi sacrée de l'Imperium au profit d'objectifs d'ordre personnel est une manifestation de la faiblesse humaine passible d'éradication immédiate." »
languages.original_text: "Fear the wrath of the Immortal One, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What would become of your protectorate or even the Imperium itself if every person did what you are proposing? No, Lex Imperialis, Volume 249, Paragraph 18/2, amendment of the twelfth year of the previous millennium clearly states: 'Actions that circumvent the sacred law of the Imperium in pursuit of personal gain are a manifestation of human weakness, which is subject to eradication.'"

traits.locale_text: « Oh que oui. Sauf si vous voulez vous attirer les foudres de l'Immortel, bien sûr ! Que deviendraient votre protectorat et l'Imperium lui-même si tout le monde s'octroyait des libertés comme vous le suggérez ? Non, l'amendement au paragraphe 18/2 du volume 249 de la Lex Imperialis, adopté le douzième cycle du millénaire dernier, est formel sur ce point. Je cite : "Toute démarche dérogeant à la loi sacrée de l'Imperium au profit d'objectifs d'ordre personnel est une manifestation de la faiblesse humaine passible d'éradication immédiate." »

languages.text: "Fürchtet den Zorn des Unsterblichen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Was würde aus Eurem Protektorat oder sogar dem Imperium, wenn alle täten, was Ihr da vorschlagt? Nein, im Lex Imperia, Band 249, Paragraf 18/2, Zusatz zum zwölften Jahr des letzten Jahrtausends, steht ganz klar: 'Handlungen, die das heilige Gesetz des Imperiums zum persönlichen Nutzen umgehen, sind eine Manifestation menschlicher Schwäche und werden mit Auslöschung geahndet.'"
languages.original_text: "Fear the wrath of the Immortal One, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What would become of your protectorate or even the Imperium itself if every person did what you are proposing? No, Lex Imperialis, Volume 249, Paragraph 18/2, amendment of the twelfth year of the previous millennium clearly states: 'Actions that circumvent the sacred law of the Imperium in pursuit of personal gain are a manifestation of human weakness, which is subject to eradication.'"

traits.locale_text: "Fürchtet den Zorn des Unsterblichen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Was würde aus Eurem Protektorat oder sogar dem Imperium, wenn alle täten, was Ihr da vorschlagt? Nein, im Lex Imperia, Band 249, Paragraf 18/2, Zusatz zum zwölften Zyklus des letzten Jahrtausends, steht ganz klar: 'Handlungen, die das heilige Gesetz des Imperiums zum persönlichen Nutzen umgehen, sind eine Manifestation menschlicher Schwäche und werden mit Auslöschung geahndet.'"

languages.text: "Ölümsüz'ün hiddetinden hiç mi korkunuz yok {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri? Herkes sizin bu dediğinizi yapsaydı, protektoranızın ve hatta İmparatorluk'un hâli ne olurdu? Katiyen olmaz! Lex İmperialis'in 249 Sayılı Cildinin 18/2 Sayılı Fıkrasının geçen binyılın 12. yılındaki yasa değişikliği açıkça belirtmektedir ki 'Şahsi çıkar peşinde İmparatorluk'un kutsal kanunlarından kaçınmak, beşerî bir zaaf olup imhaya tabidir.'"
languages.original_text: "Fear the wrath of the Immortal One, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What would become of your protectorate or even the Imperium itself if every person did what you are proposing? No, Lex Imperialis, Volume 249, Paragraph 18/2, amendment of the twelfth year of the previous millennium clearly states: 'Actions that circumvent the sacred law of the Imperium in pursuit of personal gain are a manifestation of human weakness, which is subject to eradication.'"

traits.locale_text: "Ölümsüz'ün hiddetinden hiç mi korkunuz yok {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri? Herkes sizin bu dediğinizi yapsaydı, protektoranızın ve hatta İmparatorluk'un hâli ne olurdu? Katiyen olmaz! Lex İmperialis'in 249 Sayılı Cildinin 18/2 Sayılı Fıkrasının geçen binyılın 12. yılındaki yasa değişikliği açıkça belirtmektedir ki 'Şahsi çıkar peşinde İmparatorluk'un kutsal kanunlarından kaçınmak, beşerî bir zaaf olup imhaya tabidir.'"
